snippet: The vote — the world’s largest, with 814 million people eligible to cast ballots — is considered to be India’s most consequential since 1977.
abstract: India's Election Commission announces dates for national election that is widely considered to be country's most consequential since 1977; early polls suggest that the Gandhi family, which has dominated Indian politics for most of the country’s 67-year history, could suffer its worst defeat ever.

byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and HARI KUMAR

lead_paragraph: The vote — the world’s largest, with 814 million people eligible to cast ballots — is considered to be India’s most consequential since 1977.

headline.main: Voting Dates Are Set for National Elections in India
headline.print_headline: Voting Dates Are Set for National Elections in India
